problem_names: lemma bound_linear: "\<exists> c. \<forall> n. bound (of_nat n) \<le> c * n"

lemma bound_of_nat_times: "bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v
proof (induct n)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. bound (of_nat 0 * v) \<le> 0 * bound v
 2. \<And>n.
       bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) \<le> Suc n * bound v
case (Suc n)

proof (state)
this:
  bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. bound (of_nat 0 * v) \<le> 0 * bound v
 2. \<And>n.
       bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) \<le> Suc n * bound v
have "bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) = bound (v + of_nat n * v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) = bound (v + of_nat n * v)
by (simp add: field_simps)

proof (state)
this:
  bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) = bound (v + of_nat n * v)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. bound (of_nat 0 * v) \<le> 0 * bound v
 2. \<And>n.
       bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) \<le> Suc n * bound v
also

proof (state)
this:
  bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) = bound (v + of_nat n * v)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. bound (of_nat 0 * v) \<le> 0 * bound v
 2. \<And>n.
       bound (of_nat n * v) \<le> n * bound v \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (of_nat (Suc n) * v) \<le> Suc n * bound v
have "\<dots> \<le> bound v + bound (of_nat n * v)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bound (v + of_nat n * v) \<le> bound v + bound (of_nat n * v)
by (rule bound_plus)

proof (state)
this:
  bound (v + of_nat n * v) \<le> bound v + bound (of_nat n * v)

 1. bound (of_nat 0 * v) \<le> 0 * bound v

proof (state)
this:

using Suc

goal (1 subgoal):

lemma bound_pow_of_nat: "bound (a * of_nat n ^ deg) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ deg"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bound (a * of_nat n ^ deg) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ deg
proof (induct deg)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. bound (a * of_nat n ^ 0) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ 0
 2. \<And>deg.
       bound (a * of_nat n ^ deg)
       \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ deg \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (a * of_nat n ^ Suc deg) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ Suc deg
case (Suc deg)

proof (state)
this:
  bound (a * of_nat n ^ deg) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ deg

goal (2 subgoals):

       bound (a * of_nat n ^ deg)
       \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ deg \<Longrightarrow>
       bound (a * of_nat n ^ Suc deg) \<le> bound a * of_nat n ^ Suc deg
have "bound (a * of_nat n ^ Suc deg) =  bound (of_nat n * (a * of_nat n ^ deg))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
